judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Upon full consideration of the facts and circumstances presented by the record in this appeal, we are unable to say the lower court abused its discretion in refusing to further surcharge appellees.
Decree affirmed and appeal dismissed at costs of appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: M. A. Kilker, Cyril Kilker and G. H. Kaercher, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Lehigh Navigation Coal Company’s Appeal.
Argued February 5, 1935.
March 25, 1935:
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
M. A. Kilker, Cyril Kilker and G. H. Kaercher, for appellant.
Ralph M. Bashore, for respondents.
